overview: In 10 unforgettable scenes, Adam & Eve contract star Carmen Luvana smolders! Don't miss her sizzling one on one with studly Billy Glide! And when she spreads her sweet silky folds for Allysin Chains' serpent tongue, she melts the camera lens! Plus, never-before-seen action between Carmen and Mario Rossi - it's too hot for words! In every steamy story, Carmen screws like she has something to prove!
title: Signature Series Vol. 12: Carmen Luvana
